message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $180. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $120 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about $155?
Hi Alice, I understand that you need to make a bit more, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $130. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with $130. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to make at least $145 to make it worth my while. How about we meet at $142.50?
Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but $142.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $135. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. However, $135 is still a bit short of what I'm looking for. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make at least $140 to make it worth my while. How about we meet at $138?
Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but $138 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $130. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
